Body:
"""Enable the channel and read status back."""
with expected_protocol(ik.thorlabs.APTMotorController, [init_kdc101[0],
    ThorLabsPacket(message_id=ThorLabsCommands.MOD_REQ_CHANENABLESTATE,
    param1=1, param2=0, dest=80, source=1, data=None).pack(),
    ThorLabsPacket(message_id=ThorLabsCommands.MOD_SET_CHANENABLESTATE,
    param1=1, param2=1, dest=80, source=1, data=None).pack()], [init_kdc101
    [1], ThorLabsPacket(message_id=ThorLabsCommands.MOD_GET_CHANENABLESTATE,
    param1=1, param2=2, dest=80, source=1, data=None).pack()], sep='') as apt:
    assert not apt.channel[0].enabled
    apt.channel[0].enabled = True
